sub_title: In Teaching by choice, not by option. Proud to be Teacher.
summary:
I am proud and fortunate to do what I like, love and dream: being in the field of education. I am a different person when I am in school and with children irrespective of their age, country and culture. I love helping them to grow with more knowledge and wisdom with each passing day. And in this journey what I learn from every child is incomparable.

I have 7.5 years of experience in some of the best Internationals schools of India and Netherlands and teaching both primary and secondary students in different curriculum like IB, ICSE and CBSE. My specialization is in Teaching (Mathematics and Science) with strong focus on Management as well. 
Through out my career, I played different roles like Teaching Assistant, Subject Teacher, Class Teacher, Head of Department (Mathematics) and Academic coordinator. 

My international exposure to diversified cultures in India and Netherlands and professional experience of working with top most schools like BSN (British School of Netherlands), ASH (American School of Hague) and Vibgyor has helped me evolve as a global citizen. And my willingness to learn new things, flexibility to take up any role and position which match my skills and interest, the passion I bring to the work place makes me a unique proposition.

awards.title: 100% attendance award
awards.description: Didn't miss the school even on a single working day throughout the academic year.

company.name: The British School in The Netherlands

profile_positions.company: The British School in The Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
I am working as Teaching Assistant and work with different classes (year 1 to year 6) across multiple BSN schools in Hague. 
Being my first job out of India and that to in a world class school, it is a challenge for me understanding new curriculum (IB) and teaching students from different cultures and countries. But with a fantastic BSN team and multiple training programs and also using my own experience and passion for success, I am able to overcome the challenges with a big learning curve.   

My main responsibilities are 
1. Reinforce the lessons presented by teachers by reviewing material with pupils 1-2-1 or in  groups.
2. Enforce school and class rules to help teach pupils proper behavior.
3. Ensure that the pupils are engaged in learning and stay on task during the lesson or activity.
profile_positions.title: Teaching Assistant and Exam Administrator

profile_positions.description:
Yet another success story in my ongoing Netherlands journey, I am selected as substitute teacher in another top of line International schools of Hague, ASH.
Though there are similarities between BSN and ISH in terms of curriculum, teaching standards and world class working environment, here I am tasked with handling secondary classes. And being a substitute teacher for senior students means I have to be on my toes and coordinating with main class teacher is always the key. 
I am also thankful to ASH management for providing me with opportunity to handle special student classes though I have no formal training in this area. It is a life changing experience for me and helped me to evolve as a better teaching professional and a human being. I learned a lot from each and every child.
My main responsibilities include:
1.Carry out written plans left by the regular teacher for the day's lessons and routines. 
2. Records pupil absences according to school procedures. 
3. Assumes the teacher's responsibility for supervision of students in the building and on the grounds
profile_positions.title: Substitute Teacher

profile_positions.description:
My favorite school in India which helped me to grow faster by providing me with different opportunities and challenges. Here the curriculum is ICSE and I performed multiple roles in this school as Academic coordinator (handling 10+ teachers), Head of the Department (Mathematics), Class teacher and Event Coordinator also.

I joined as subject teacher in this school and promoted to Academic Coordinator in less than two years only which is one of the firsts in the school. I also successfully organized “VIVA”, an annual extravaganza concert, which involves 1000+ students.
profile_positions.title: Middle school Coordinator and Mathematics Teacher

profile_positions.description:
My first break through into International schools. Curriculum is CBSE. I joined here as primary class teacher and went on to perform other roles like Head of the Department (Mathematics) and House mistress for Sports activities.
My core responsibilities were:
1. Lesson planning taking account of students’ prior knowledge & academic objectives.
2. As HOD, advising and contributing to curriculum development at school under the direction and guidance of the Principal and Head of Education officer. Also responsible for exams paper setting.
profile_positions.title: Head Of Department (Mathematics) and Class Teacher

profile_positions.description:
This school has special place in my heart as it gave me wings to fly in dream field, education.
I worked here as a subject teacher (Mathematics) for primary class students.
profile_positions.title: Class Teacher

skills: Subject teaching through Blooms taxonomy, Multiple Intelligence & G-Os
Conducting gallery walks on specific topics
Workshops for other teachers on Multiple Intelligences
